name: tabby-cat
description: Debating tabulation software for two-team parliamentary formats

scripts.serve: npm run serve-sass & npm run serve-vue
scripts.build: npm run build-sass && npm run build-vue && npm run cp-fonts && npm run cp-i18n && npm run cp-js
scripts.build-sass: npx node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules/ --include-path --output tabbycat/static/css/ tabbycat/templates/scss/style.scss && npx  node-sass --output-style compressed --include-path node_modules/ --include-path --output tabbycat/static/css/ tabbycat/templates/scss/printables.scss
scripts.cp-js: cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.js tabbycat/static/js/vendor && cp node_modules/jquery-validation/dist/jquery.validate.js tabbycat/static/js/vendor && cp node_modules/jsbarcode/dist/JsBarcode.all.min.js tabbycat/static/js/vendor
scripts.cp-fonts: mkdir -p tabbycat/static/fonts && cp node_modules/inter-ui/Inter\ UI\ \(web\)/* tabbycat/static/fonts
